amendment.description: To require a report on compliance with Department of Defense and Service policies regarding runway clear zones.

vote.text: Amendment SA 756 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 756 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Van Hollen to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5788) To require a report on compliance with Department of Defense and Service policies regarding runway clear zones.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 756 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 756 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Van Hollen to Amendment SA 1003.
